description: Never good enough, always pushing. Let's embrace 'good enough.'

art.title: Beautiful Imperfection Art
art.instruction: Create art celebrating imperfection - asymmetrical designs, happy accidents, rough edges.
art.affirmation: I find beauty in imperfection and embrace my perfectly imperfect humanity

breathwork.title: Good Enough Breathing
breathwork.instruction: Breathe 'good enough' into perfectionist parts. Release need for flawless performance.
breathwork.affirmation: I am good enough exactly as I am

somatic.title: Perfectionism Tension Release
somatic.instruction: Notice where perfectionism creates tension. Consciously soften these areas.
somatic.affirmation: I release perfectionist tension and allow ease

cbt.title: Perfectionism Cost Analysis
cbt.instruction: List costs of perfectionism vs benefits of 'good enough.'
cbt.affirmation: I choose progress and peace over perfectionist suffering

rebt.title: Perfect Performance Demand
rebt.instruction: Challenge 'I must perform perfectly.' Good is preferable, perfect is impossible.
rebt.affirmation: I prefer good performance but accept that perfection is impossible

neural.title: Good Enough Identity Installation
neural.instruction: Install identity appreciating excellence but accepting good enough.
neural.affirmation: I balance excellence with acceptance of good enough

journaling.title: Perfectionism Pattern Journal
journaling.instruction: Write about perfectionist patterns and healthier alternatives.
journaling.affirmation: I understand perfectionism and choose healthier alternatives

eft.title: Perfectionism Release Tapping
eft.instruction: Tap: 'Even though I pressure myself to be perfect, I embrace beautiful imperfection.'
eft.affirmation: I release perfectionist pressure and embrace my perfectly imperfect self

emdr.title: Good Enough Success Installation
emdr.instruction: Install memories of 'good enough' leading to success.
emdr.affirmation: Good enough truly is good enough

yoga.title: Imperfect Balance Practice
yoga.instruction: Balance poses accepting wobbles as natural and perfect.
yoga.affirmation: I find grace in my perfectly imperfect balance
